verses.verse: מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> is this בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> Who [is] this that cometh מֵאֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> from Edom חֲמ֤וּץ <S%H2556><s%> with dyed בְּגָדִים֙ <S%H899><s%> garments מִבָּצְרָ֔ה <S%H1224><s%> Bozrah זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> This הָד֣וּר <S%H1921><s%> is majestic בִּלְבוּשׁ֔וֹ <S%H3830><s%> in his apparel צֹעֶ֖ה <S%H6808><s%> travelling בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> in the greatness כֹּח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> ability אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I מְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> answer בִּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> in righteousness רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> mighty לְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> to save

מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why אָדֹ֖ם <S%H122><s%> Wherefore [art thou] red לִלְבוּשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H3830><s%> in thine apparel וּבְגָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H899><s%> and thy garments כְּדֹרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1869><s%> like him that treadeth בְּגַֽת׃ <S%H1660><s%> the wine

פּוּרָ֣ה ׀ <S%H6333><s%> the winepress דָּרַ֣כְתִּי <S%H1869><s%> I have trodden לְבַדִּ֗י <S%H905><s%> alone וּמֵֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> alone and of the people אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [there was] none אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> also וְאֶדְרְכֵ֣ם <S%H1869><s%> with me for I will tread בְּאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> them in mine anger וְאֶרְמְסֵ֖ם <S%H7429><s%> and trample בַּחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> them in my fury וְיֵ֤ז <S%H5137><s%> shall be sprinkled נִצְחָם֙ <S%H5332><s%> and their blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בְּגָדַ֔י <S%H899><s%> upon my garments וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְבּוּשַׁ֖י <S%H4403><s%> all my raiment אֶגְאָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H1351><s%> and I will stain

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For the day נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> of vengeance בְּלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> [is] in mine heart וּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> and the year גְּאוּלַ֖י <S%H1350><s%> of my redeemed בָּֽאָה׃ <S%H935><s%> is come

וְאַבִּיט֙ <S%H5027><s%> And I looked וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there עֹזֵ֔ר <S%H5826><s%> and [there was] none to help וְאֶשְׁתּוֹמֵ֖ם <S%H8074><s%> and I wondered וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was no סוֹמֵ֑ךְ <S%H5564><s%> that [there was] none to uphold וַתּ֤וֹשַֽׁע <S%H3467><s%> brought salvation לִי֙ זְרֹעִ֔י <S%H2220><s%> therefore mine own arm וַחֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> unto me and my fury הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he סְמָכָֽתְנִי׃ <S%H5564><s%> it upheld

וְאָב֤וּס <S%H947><s%> And I will tread down עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger וַאֲשַׁכְּרֵ֖ם <S%H7937><s%> and make them drunk בַּחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> in my fury וְאוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> and I will bring down לָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the earth נִצְחָֽם׃ <S%H5332><s%> their strength ס

חַֽסְדֵ֨י <S%H2617><s%> the lovingkindnesses יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַזְכִּיר֙ <S%H2142><s%> I will mention תְּהִלֹּ֣ת <S%H8416><s%> [and] the praises יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּעַ֕ל <S%H5921><s%> According כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which גְּמָלָ֖נוּ <S%H1580><s%> hath bestowed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> on us and the great טוּב֙ <S%H2898><s%> goodness לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> toward the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which גְּמָלָ֥ם <S%H1580><s%> which he hath bestowed כְּֽרַחֲמָ֖יו <S%H7356><s%> on them according to his mercies וּכְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and according to the multitude חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <S%H2617><s%> of his lovingkindnesses

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> For he said אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> Surely they [are] my people הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> who will not יְשַׁקֵּ֑רוּ <S%H8266><s%> [that] will not lie וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְמוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> so he was their Saviour

בְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צָרָתָ֣ם ׀ <S%H6869><s%> In all their affliction [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) צָ֗ר <S%H6862><s%> he was afflicted וּמַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> and the angel פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> of his presence הֽוֹשִׁיעָ֔ם <S%H3467><s%> saved בְּאַהֲבָת֥וֹ <S%H160><s%> them in his love וּבְחֶמְלָת֖וֹ <S%H2551><s%> and in his pity ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He גְאָלָ֑ם <S%H1350><s%> he redeemed וַֽיְנַטְּלֵ֥ם <S%H5190><s%> them and he bare וַֽיְנַשְּׂאֵ֖ם <S%H5375><s%> them and carried כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> them all the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of old

וְהֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they מָר֥וּ <S%H4784><s%> But they rebelled וְעִצְּב֖וּ <S%H6087><s%> and vexed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Spirit קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> his holy וַיֵּהָפֵ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> therefore he was turned לָהֶ֛ם לְאוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> to be their enemy ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He נִלְחַם־ <S%H3898><s%> [and] he fought בָּֽם׃

וַיִּזְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> Then he remembered יְמֵֽי־ <S%H3117><s%> the days עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> of old מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> [and] his people אַיֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H346><s%> Where הַֽמַּעֲלֵ֣ם <S%H5927><s%> [saying] Where [is] he that brought them up מִיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> out of the sea אֵ֚ת <S%H854><s%> with רֹעֵ֣י <S%H7462><s%> with the shepherd צֹאנ֔וֹ <S%H6629><s%> cattle אַיֵּ֛ה <S%H346><s%> Where הַשָּׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> put בְּקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> within אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Spirit קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> his holy

מוֹלִיךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> to go לִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> [them] by the right hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm תִּפְאַרְתּ֑וֹ <S%H8597><s%> with his glorious בּ֤וֹקֵֽעַ <S%H1234><s%> dividing מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the water מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> them to make ל֖וֹ שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> himself an everlasting

מוֹלִיכָ֖ם <S%H1980><s%> led בַּתְּהֹמ֑וֹת <S%H8415><s%> them through the deep כַּסּ֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> as an horse בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> [that] they should not stumble

כַּבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> As a beast בַּבִּקְעָ֣ה <S%H1237><s%> into the valley תֵרֵ֔ד <S%H3381><s%> goeth down ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תְּנִיחֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5117><s%> caused him to rest כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> So נִהַ֣גְתָּ <S%H5090><s%> so didst thou lead עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> thy people לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make לְךָ֖ שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name תִּפְאָֽרֶת׃ <S%H8597><s%> thyself a glorious

הַבֵּ֤ט <S%H5027><s%> Look down מִשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and behold מִזְּבֻ֥ל <S%H2073><s%> from the habitation קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H6944><s%> of thy holiness וְתִפְאַרְתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H8597><s%> and of thy glory אַיֵּ֤ה <S%H346><s%> Where קִנְאָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H7068><s%> where [is] thy zeal וּגְב֣וּרֹתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1369><s%> and thy strength הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> the sounding מֵעֶ֛יךָ <S%H4578><s%> of thy bowels וְֽרַחֲמֶ֖יךָ <S%H7356><s%> and of thy mercies אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> toward הִתְאַפָּֽקוּ׃ <S%H662><s%> toward me? are they restrained

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Doubtless אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> thou [art] our father כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> though אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> though Abraham לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יְדָעָ֔נוּ <S%H3045><s%> know וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of us and Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַכִּירָ֑נוּ <S%H5234><s%> acknowledge אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> us not thou O LORD אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> [art] our father גֹּאֲלֵ֥נוּ <S%H1350><s%> our redeemer מֵֽעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [is] from everlasting שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תַתְעֵ֤נוּ <S%H8582><s%> why hast thou made us to err יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מִדְּרָכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1870><s%> from thy ways תַּקְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H7188><s%> [and] hardened לִבֵּ֖נוּ <S%H3820><s%> our heart מִיִּרְאָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3374><s%> fearing שׁ֚וּב <S%H7725><s%> Return לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servants' שִׁבְטֵ֖י <S%H7626><s%> sake the tribes נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5159><s%> of thine inheritance

לַמִּצְעָ֕ר <S%H4705><s%> [it] but a little while יָרְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3423><s%> have possessed עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> The people קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> of thy holiness צָרֵ֕ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> our adversaries בּוֹסְס֖וּ <S%H947><s%> have trodden down מִקְדָּשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H4720><s%> thy sanctuary

הָיִ֗ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> have become מֵֽעוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> We are [thine] thou never לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מָשַׁ֣לְתָּ <S%H4910><s%> barest rule בָּ֔ם לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> over them they were not called שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and לוּא־
